# vngcloud_vserver_volume_type (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vngcloud_vserver_volume_type" "volume_type" {
    name = "SSD-IOPS3000"
    project_id = "pro-462803f3-6858-466f-bf05-df2b33faa360"
    volume_type_zone_id = "1B9FF75D-00F5-49CA-842D-CCD5D04834FB"
}
```
